_sText: I made this prefab almost 2 years ago and have used it in a couple of maps. fy_carbomb fy_brainstew it works awesome. there is a trigger box within the center of the car, the higher you stretch it the higher the car blows. this comes complete with smoke and a fiery explosion. it will kill any person that happens to be within 5-10 feet or so. I made this using a tutorial from valve. this is not however exactly the same as the tutorial, I've added my own tweaks and additions while learning how it worked. enjoy
